wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Mangham (born 1979) is a literary critic and professor at the University of Reading, UK. He is best known for his work on Victorian literature and is the author of The Science of Starving (2020), Dickens's Forensic Realism (2017) and Violent Women and Sensation Fiction (2007). Mangham was born in Thurnscoe, a coal-mining village near Barnsley, South Yorkshire.

response: According to Andrew Mangham "Menotti Lerro is one of the most interesting poets in modern-day Europe".
*Selected Poems translated by Maria Rosaria La Marca and Andrew Mangham (Genesi: 2011)
*Andrew Mangham, The Poetry of Menotti Lerro, Cambridge Scholars Publishing 2011 (Hardcover version)
*Andrew Mangham, The Poetry of Menotti Lerro, Cambridge Scholars Publishing 2012 (Paperback enlarged version)
